2T1h1e1 1y1e1a1r1-1o1l1d1 1G1a1l1i1l1e1o1 1d1i1d1n1'1t1 1i1n1v1e1n1t1 1t1h1e1 1t1e1l1e1s1c1o1p1e1,1 1a1n1d1 1h1e1 1w1a1s1n1'1t1 1t1h1e1 1f1i1r1s1t1 1t1o1 1p1o1i1n1t1 1o1n1e1 1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1s1k1y1.1 1B1u1t1 1h1i1s1 1c1o1n1c1l1u1s1i1o1n1s1 1c1h1a1n1g1e1d1 1h1i1s1t1o1r1y1.1 1G1a1l1i1l1e1o1 1k1n1e1w1 1h1e1'1d1 1f1o1u1n1d1 1p1r1o2f1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1e1 1t1h1e1o1r1i1e1s1 1o1f1 1P1o1l1i1s1h1 1a1s1t1r1o1n1o1m1e1r1 1N1i1c1o1l1a1u1s1 1C1o1p1e1r1n1i1c1u1s1 1,1 1w1h1o1 1h1a1d1 1l1a1u1n1c1h1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1S1c1i1e1n1t1i1f1i1c1 1R1e1v1o1l1u1t1i1o1n1 1w1i1t1h1 1h1i1s1 1s1u1n1-1c1e1n1t1e1r1e1d1 1s1o1l1a1r1 1s1y1s1t1e1m1 1m1o1d1e1l1.1
2G1a1l1i1l1e1o1'1s1 1w1o1r1k1 1w1a1s1n1'1t1 1a1l2 1s1t1a1r1i1n1g1 1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1s1k1y1,1 1e1i1t1h1e1r1:1 1H1i1s1 1s1t1u1d1i1e1s1 1o1f1 1f1a1l2i1n1g1 1b1o1d1i1e1s1 1s1h1o1w1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1o1b1j1e1c1t1s1 1d1r1o1p2e1d1 1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1s1a1m1e1 1t1i1m1e1 1w1i1l2 1h1i1t1 1t1h1e1 1g1r1o1u1n1d1 1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1s1a1m1e1 1t1i1m1e1,1 1b1a1r2i1n1g1 1a1i1r1 1r1e1s1i1s1t1a1n1c1e1 1-1 1g1r1a1v1i1t1y1 1d1o1e1s1n1'1t1 1d1e1p1e1n1d1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1s1i1z1e1.1 1A1n1d1 1h1i1s1 1l1a1w1 1o1f1 1i1n1e1r1t1i1a1 1a1l2o1w1e1d1 1f1o1r1 1E1a1r1t1h1 1i1t1s1e1l1f1 1t1o1 1r1o1t1a1t1e1.1
2B1u1t1 1a1l2 1t1h1i1s1 1h1e1a1v1e1n1l1y1 1m1o1t1i1o1n1 1c1o1n1t1r1a1d1i1c1t1e1d1 1R1o1m1a1n1 1C1a1t1h1o1l1i1c1 1d1o1c1t1r1i1n1e1,1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1w1a1s1 1b1a1s1e1d1 1o1n1 1A1r1i1s1t1o1t1l1e1'1s1 1i1n1c1o1r2e1c1t1 1v1i1e1w1s1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1c1o1s1m1o1s1.1 1T1h1e1 1c1h1u1r1c1h1 1d1e1c1l1a1r1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1s1u1n1-1c1e1n1t1e1r1e1d1 1m1o1d1e1l1 1h1e1r1e1t1i1c1a1l1,1 1a1n1d1 1a1n1 1i1n1q1u1i1s1i1t1i1o1n1 1i1n1 1o1r1d1e1r1e1d1 1G1a1l1i1l1e1o1 1t1o1 1s1t1o1p1 1p1r1o1m1o1t1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1v1i1e1w1s1.1 1T1h1e1 1r1e1a1l1 1b1l1o1w1 1f1r1o1m1 1r1e1l1i1g1i1o1u1s1 1o1f2i1c1i1a1l1s1 1c1a1m1e1 1i1n1,1 1a1f1t1e1r1 1G1a1l1i1l1e1o1 1p1u1b1l1i1s1h1e1d1 1a1 1c1o1m1p1a1r1i1s1o1n1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1C1o1p1e1r1n1i1c1a1n1 1(1s1u1n1-1c1e1n1t1e1r1e1d1)1 1a1n1d1 1P1t1o1l1e1m1a1i1c1 1(1E1a1r1t1h1-1c1e1n1t1e1r1e1d1)1 1s1y1s1t1e1m1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1m1a1d1e1 1t1h1e1 1l1a1t2e1r1'1s1 1b1e1l1i1e1v1e1r1s1 1l1o2k1 1f1o2l1i1s1h1.1 1T1h1e1y1 1p1l1a1c1e1d1 1h1i1m1 1u1n1d1e1r1 1h1o1u1s1e1 1a1r2e1s1t1 1u1n1t1i1l1 1h1i1s1 1d1e1a1t1h1 1i1n1,1 1t1h1e1 1s1a1m1e1 1y1e1a1r1 1I1s1a2c1 1N1e1w1t1o1n1 1w1a1s1 1b1o1r1n1.1
